=== Last Position ===
(row = 7, col = 13)

The avatar did not move from its last position (row = 7, col = 13). To determine a suitable action, I'll analyze the surroundings of the current position:

- At (row = 7, col = 13), there is the avatar (a).
- To the left (row = 7, col = 12) is an empty space (.).
- To the right (row = 7, col = 14) is another empty space (.).
- Above (row = 6, col = 13) is an empty space (.).
- Below (row = 8, col = 13) is also an empty space (.).
- To the left of (row = 7, col = 13) (row = 7, col = 12) and down below (row = 8, col = 13) are safe spots for further movements.

Given this analysis, moving in any direction will yield no immediate threats or advantages since there are no boxes or monsters directly in the vicinity. 

However, I'll choose to move **up** to (row = 6, col = 13) to explore that area further and continue looking for boxes.

``` Action: 4 ```
I expect to see more opportunities to interact with the environment or collect items in the above row.
